section.p: This method initializes the video view of a local stream on the local device. It affects only the video view that the local user sees, not the published local video stream. Call this method to bind the local video stream to a video view and to set the rendering and mirror modes of the video view.

In App development, this method is usually called after initialization to set the local video, and then join the channel. The binding is still valid after the user leaves the channel, which means that the window still displays. To unbind the view, set the view in VideoCanvas to NULL.

ul.li: You can call this method either before or after joining a channel.
If you want to update the rendering or mirroring mode of the local user view during a call, please use the method.
